overview: A short documentary about a 27 year old man who loves riding his BMX in a place where extremesports are starting to become recognized as a good thing and not just something for kids. We get to hear him speak about what keeps him excited to keep riding his BMX-bike after he's been doing it over a decade and how he keeps himself sane in consideration to the long and harsh winters in northern Sweden.
title: Nordens Pojk
